subject: AI & Agents
title: Relation Extraction: How Entities Connect
description: A fast breakdown of Relation Extraction: How Entities Connect for builders.

hook.text: 'Elon Musk founded SpaceX.' Relation extraction finds: (Musk, founded, SpaceX).

buildup.text: After NER finds entities, relation extraction determines how they're connected.

discovery.text: Output is a triple: (subject, relation, object). These triples build knowledge graphs.

twist.text: Implicit relations are hard: 'After leaving Google, she joined Meta' implies employment at both.

climax.text: LLMs can extract relations zero-shot, but domain-specific models are more reliable.

punchline.text: Entities are nodes. Relations are edges. Text becomes a graph.
